subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders improved to 8-2-0 against division rivals with a victory against the visiting Devils, and ended the month with an 11-3-0 record to extend their franchise-best start.
snippet: The Islanders improved to 8-2-0 against division rivals with a victory against the visiting Devils, and ended the month with an 11-3-0 record to extend their franchise-best start.
